description: Watch the status of your canary deployments via Flagger. Source was Flagger's dashboard available in Github, but which was updated 3 years ago and needed a bunch of refactoring to modern Prometheus & Grafana. Also added various improvements.

options.content: Select your namespace and workload. The current (primary) version's metrics will display on the left, and the canary's on the right.

panels.title: Primary: Incoming Requests by Source And Response Code
Canary: Incoming Requests by Source And Response Code
Primary: Outgoing Requests by Destination And Response Code
Canary: Outgoing Requests by Destination And Response Code
Requests, Error, Duration (RED) - Only usable for Istio-enabled Services
Primary: App CPU Usage (Avg all PODs, excludes Istio proxy)
Canary: App CPU Usage (Avg all PODs, excludes Istio proxy)

title: Flagger Canary Status
